name: ECO FRIENDLY SPORTS ORGANISATION
briefDescription: Eco Friendly Sports Organisation (EFSO) is a registered NGO from India (Asia) having a members from respectable fields like Judiciary, Administration, Business, Finance, Education, Sports. EFSO is working on various projects, to create opportunities and environment and provide guidance for the Socio & economic development of people and the area. EFSO provides innovative solutions to complex problems which require simple methods for the sustainable development of the world. EFSO would like to invite your prestigious Organisation for joint initiative program in on going sustainable development project, 1.
